params.attack: Attack somebody with a rampage astral attack. They are roleblocked.(1 Use)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Dragon Breath**: Attack three people consecutive to each other.(1 Use)
**Perch:**: Gain one more use of every other ability

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Consecutive is consecutive numbers on the player list. Dead players do not count for this.
If you perch, the town gets the message “The dragon is perching!” At the start of the night
This role may not spawn naturally
